enhanced_description: ServiceNow is a cloud-based platform designed to digitize and unify organizations, enabling smarter, faster, and more agile workflows. It aims to optimize productivity, reduce costs, and increase resilience by providing a single IT platform. The platform emphasizes reinventing both employee and customer experiences through AI-driven self-service and intelligent automation, and also empowers users to build new workflows and applications with low-code capabilities and AI-powered natural language prompts.
